according to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as.

(a) especially in plur: few, (b) in sing: small; hence, of time: short, of degree: light, slight, little.

5.long: a messenger, envoy, delegate, one commissioned by another to represent him in some way, especially a man sent out by Jesus Christ Himself to preach the Gospel; an apostle.
